description.value: Classification of relationship between a therapy and a contraindication or an indication.

display.value: Only contraindicated if the other therapy is given

definition.value: Only contraindicated if the other therapy is given

display.value: Contraindicated unless the other therapy is given

definition.value: Contraindicated unless the other therapy is given

display.value: Indicated only when the other therapy is given (co-occurrent)

definition.value: Indicated only when the other therapy is given (co-occurrent)

display.value: Indicated except when the other therapy is given

definition.value: Indicated except when the other therapy is given

display.value: Indicated only if the other therapy is planned to be given afterwards (prep)

definition.value: Indicated only if the other therapy is planned to be given afterwards (prep)

display.value: Indicated only if the other therapy was given before (follow-up)

definition.value: Indicated only if the other therapy was given before (follow-up)

display.value: Indicated to replace the other therapy

definition.value: Indicated to replace the other therapy

display.value: Indicated to replace the other contraindicated therapy

definition.value: Indicated to replace the other contraindicated therapy.

display.value: Indicated to replace the other therapy not well tolerated by patient

definition.value: Indicated to replace the other therapy not well tolerated by patient

display.value: Indicated to replace the other therapy not effective on patient

definition.value: Indicated to replace the other therapy not effective on patient
